name: iKun-Polished
description:
We developed a 7 level 3D AI chasing game named "Chicken, You are so beautiful" with traps, enemies and bosses. The inspiration of this game comes from a very popular Chinese idol whose name is Xukun Cai.  We tried to use the element of chicken, basketball, and the BGM to create a single player adventure game. In this game, you will hear the sound of him like "ji~"  or "What are you doing?~", etc. Of course, you will experience the thrill of being chased by a chicken. Trust me, there is more than that stuff. Just explore it by yourself and enjoy : )

Note: 

Lower down your volume of sound !!!

You can use the video as a map for each level.
